main.pc.p1: This is an easy-handle and fast IDE software with user friendly cloud service!
main.pc.p3: 1. Easy-handle: It has no complex functions.{br}2. Fast: It keeps to the basic.{br}3. Together: It helps you to share your code effectively with others on PC and even mobile.
main.pc.p4: You can be a code developer right now!{br}Let's download and do this!
